name: Devil Catcher
description:
Devil Catcher is a third-person Platformer with some Light Combat elements.

It was created for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 GameJam.

The Original Cover Inspiration and Character Designs by Chiquwawi:

Game made by: 

https://twitter.com/Tenkaiyo

https://www.instagram.com/tenkaiyo/

Original FamiCase by: 

https://www.instagram.com/chiqu1wawi/ 

https://twitter.com/Chiquiwawi

https://chiquiwawi.bigcartel.com/
